title: Non-serif font with crisscross W?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5694.png)
  
I've been trying to figure out what this font is for a while, all to no avail. =3=  
Does anyone have any idea what it may be? The W was the thing that stood out the most in the font.

Font: 

 ITC Eras Book
